.. Relatórios
.. ==========


.. - `Relatório de Testes <_static/report.html>`_
.. - `Cobertura de Código <_static/htmlcov/index.html>`_

Reports
=======

This section provides the main reports generated during the development of the project.  
The **Test Report** contains the results of the automated tests executed with *pytest*,  
while the **Coverage Report** shows the code coverage analysis generated using *pytest* with the coverage plugin.  


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   test
   coverage
